/
Analytical Models

Analytical Models¶

Note

This class is still under development and may change in the future.

Contains analytical methods that allow comparison with FDM results.

AnalyticalMethods(**kwargs)

Base class for analytical methods.

ThompsonEBBCont1LSupp(**kwargs)

Method for continuous slab single rail track according to Thompson [3].

ThompsonEBBCont2LSupp(**kwargs)

Method for continuous ballasted single rail track according to Thompson [3].

ThompsonTBDiscr(**kwargs)

Base class for analytical solutions of a discrete single rail track.

ThompsonTSDiscr1LSupp(**kwargs)

Method for discrete slab track according to Thompson [3] and Heckl [4].

ThompsonTSDiscr2LSupp(**kwargs)

Method for discrete ballasted track according to Thompson [3].
